titles.title: Military Housing Fairness Act of 2001

To amend title 37, United States Code, to ensure that the rates of the basic allowance for housing for military housing areas inside the United States are sufficient to eliminate out-of-pocket housing costs for members entitled to the allowance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/26/2001--Introduced. Military Housing Fairness Act of 2001 - Directs the Secretary of Defense, in prescribing the rates of the military basic housing allowance inside the United States, to ensure that such rates are sufficient to eliminate, no later than September 30, 2003, out-of-pocket housing costs for members to obtain adequate housing in that military housing area.
